sub_title: Business Development I Operation and Logistics. manager I Airline and Cargo Security | Homeland Security |
summary:
★ Head of Airline Security with 5 years’ experience in aviation and cargo security. 
★ Served 24 years of active and reserve-duty in the Israeli military Special Forces, attaining the rank of Lieutenant Colonel and acting as Battalion Officer commanding 700 soldiers. 
★ Headhunted and actively recruited to my current employer – El Al.
★ Led and directed a successful business for 14 years selling motorized curtains and blinds. 
With a unique combination of military and operational skills partnered with excellent business acumen and commercial savvy.
★ Experience working in several territories and relocation readiness !

𝓔𝔁𝓹𝓮𝓻𝓽𝓲𝓼𝓮:
✔ Management experience in a dynamic environment.
✔ Rare combination of business experience along with my security experience.
✔ Goal and results oriented 
✔ Lead Teams and team player mission and teams.
✔ Meeting goals even under pressured conditions
✔ Homeland security expert

Feel free to be in touch with me at: ✉ baraklev7@gmail.com

Specialties: Homeland security, Management , Risk assessment, Business manager, Team building, Leadership, security, Risk Management, Recruiting and team development, Airline, Airport, Security , Management, Program Development, Budget, Procurement, Cargo and Organizing Processes, Physical security, surveillance

profile_positions.description:
★Senior leadership, responsible for managing and overseeing the day-to-day operations of a real estate organization.  ensuring efficient and effective processes and systems are in place. 
★ Manage and allocate resources effectively, including financial resources, and physical assets. includes budgeting, forecasting, and resource planning to ensure the organization has the necessary resources to meet operational objectives.
★Project Management: Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of real estate projects, such as property acquisitions, development, construction, and property management. This involves coordinating with various stakeholders, including architects, contractors, vendors, and legal professionals, to ensure projects are completed on time and within budget.
★Risk Management: Identify and mitigate operational risks by implementing appropriate risk management strategies and protocols. This includes ensuring compliance with relevant laws and regulations, maintaining proper insurance coverage, and implementing safety measures to protect clients and properties.
★Vendor and Supplier Management: Manage relationships with vendors, suppliers, and service providers to ensure timely delivery of goods and services, negotiate contracts and agreements, and maintain high standards of quality and service.
Ensure compliance with all applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards related to real estate operations. Stay up to date with changes in regulations and implement necessary measures to ensure compliance.
profile_positions.title: Head of  Operations Real Estate
Chief Of Operations I Logistics and Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
★ Led a large-scale airline station, overseeing all airport security, ground operations, and passenger, baggage, and cargo management for ElAl Airlines in the Netherlands, Sweden, Norway, and Finland.
★ Managing a team of 60 staff including recruitment, training, mentorship, and performance management as well as managing 1000 flights/year and an annual budget of $100M USD.
★ Interfacing with the highest echelons of State governance and emergency services such as the 
 Minister of Interior and Head of Police.
★ Ensure compliance with established security policies and procedures, detect breaches in security services, and recommend any changes that are indicated for countermeasures.
★ Commanding security-related incidents and tactical operations until resolution.
★ Managing all hands-on, practical aspects of the job including carrying-out a daily debriefing to staff.
★ Strictly complying with all local, international and Israeli government policies and regulations.   

𝓐𝓬𝓱𝓲𝓮𝓿𝓮𝓶𝓮𝓷𝓽:
★ Headhunted and actively recruited to a country-level role by the Israeli Office of the Prime Minister due to a unique combination of military/security skills partnered with business savvy.
★ Comprehensively restructured the airline’s Passenger and Cargo Departments – which led to a doubled cargo capacity.

Specialties: Management, Risk assessment, Business manager, responsible, team building, 
Leadership, security, Risk Management ,Security Audits, Recruiting and team development, Airline, Airport, Security, Program Development, Budget, Procurement, Cargo and Organizing Processes,Physical security, surveillance
profile_positions.title: Head of Airline Security  Netherlands & Scndinavia

profile_positions.description:
★ Led a small-scale airline station, overseeing all airport security, ground operations, and passenger, baggage, and cargo management for ElAl Airlines in Venice.
★ Managing a team of 16 staff including recruitment, training, and performance management.
★ Commanding security-related incidents and tactical operations until resolution.
★ Managing all hands-on, practical aspects of the job and carrying-out a daily debriefing to staff.
★ Strictly complying with all local, international and Israeli government policies and regulations.   
 
𝓐𝓬𝓱𝓲𝓮𝓿𝓮𝓶𝓮𝓷𝓽:
★ Successfully established the station within 8 months, from the ground up, including the physical office location and design, office documents and work procedures and sourcing all required technology.
★ Recruited 16 local and international staff as well as building teams and developing new managers.
★ Four years on, the Venice station is operational and functioning well due to the excellent foundation and infrastructure we established.
★ Finding and maintaining suitable properties for the company.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Airline Security : Venice

profile_positions.description:
★ Led a successful mid-size business selling motorized curtains and blinds to large clientele including Israel’s international airport, luxury hotels as well as private clients.
★ Managing a team of 12 employees as well as the company’s customer service, marketing and PR functions.
★ End-to-end project management from writing up quotes, selling, and designing to working closely with architects and big international companies. 
Negotiating and developing relationships with suppliers.

𝓐𝓬𝓱𝓲𝓮𝓿𝓮𝓶𝓮𝓷𝓽:
★  Won several lucrative, high-profile contracts with large customers including Israel’s international airport and several major hotel chains.
profile_positions.title: Business Owner, Manager
